thread.title: Hawaiian Airlines flies 1M passengers in July, increase of 5% from a year ago
thread.title_full: Hawaiian Airlines flies 1M passengers in July, increase of 5% from a year ago

title: Hawaiian Airlines flies 1M passengers in July, increase of 5% from a year ago
text:
Tina Yuen Hawaiian Airlines flew more than 1 million passengers in July, a 5.2 percent increase… more Hawaiian Airlines flew more than 1 million passengers in July, a 5.2 percent increase from the 957,876 passengers the Honolulu-based carrier flew in July 2014, the airline said Wednesday . Hawaiian Airlines, a subsidiary of Hawaiian Holdings, Inc. (Nasdaq: HA), said traffic — or revenue passenger miles — increased 3.8 percent last month, and said capacity — or available seat miles — grew by 3.9 percent. The airline’s load factor, or percentage of seating capacity filled, was 84.5 percent in July, which was 0.1 percentage points lower than the same month a year ago. For the first seven months of the year, the passenger count grew by 5.1 percent, while traffic grew by 4.6 percent, capacity grew by 4.4 percent and the load factor increased by 0.1 percentage points to 80.7 percent, Hawaiian Airlines said. 
Want Honolulu Travel   Industries
